biocontainers.name: panphlan
biocontainers.summary: Panphlan is a strain-level metagenomic profiling tool for identifying the gene composition and in-vivo transcriptional activity of individual strains in metagenomic samples. panphlan's ability for strain-tracking and functional analysis of unknown pathogens makes it an efficient tool for nculture-free infectious outbreak epidemiology and microbial population nstudies.
